revised_title: Electrical Interference Phenomena and Their Analogies to Newton's Rings
tldr: This article discusses electrical interference phenomena that are somewhat analogous to Newton's rings. The author presents nine experiments and explains the disturbances that arise from electrical waves not being suddenly lost after their first incidence on the abnormal part of the secondary. A method to avoid the greatest disturbance is suggested, and the results are compared with a mathematical theory of the phenomena involved.
